doc.after: Thatcher s first foreign policy crisis came with the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan She condemned the invasion said it showed the bankruptcy of a d tente policy and helped convince some British athletes to boycott the 1980 Moscow Olympics She gave weak support to American President Jimmy Carter who tried to punish the USSR with economic sanctions Britain s economic situation was precarious and most of NATO was reluctant to cut trade ties 150
